activities:
With respect to the personal information we receive from or on behalf of our customers and other persons in Switzerland, Sungard AS complies with the U.S.-Swiss Safe Harbor Framework as set forth by the U.S. Department of Commerce regarding the collection, use, and retention of personal information from Switzerland. 

When Sungard AS is a data controller: - Personal information collected online and offline in connection with Sungard AS business activities, including information concerning current, prospective and former customers; vendors and channel partners. Sungard AS collects, transfers, and uses this information for a range of business purposes, including direct and indirect sales and marketing activities, provisioning of Services and related support, and quality assurance to improve Services and Customer experience. 
When Sungard AS is a data processor: - When providing Services to its Customers, Sungard AS may process personal data owned and controlled by its Customers (“Services Data”). Sungard AS processes that data at the direction of its Customers and in accordance with the terms of its agreements with its Customers. Customers are responsible for compliance with applicable data protection principles. Sungard AS maintains a separate Services Data Privacy Policy in connection with its provision of Services to its Customers.
contactoff1: Sungard Availability Services LP Compliance - Legal Department
personaldata: Personal data collected from current, prospective and former customers, vendors and channel partners (On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed).
recoursemech: Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
